nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. South southeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Sunday

Mostly sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
